title: Evil In The Object | Eric Vitale Interview
description:
We’ve all heard the stories. Someone goes to an antique store, buys an item that truly “speaks to them”, then slowly, strange things begin happening around their home. Surprise, you bought a haunted object. The world’s most famous collection of haunted objects resides in a small building in New England, on a property once owned by Ed And Lorraine Warren. The famed Annabelle doll, and many other relics of real-life horror, all trapped behind its walls and the binding prayers that are said there. Today we take a deep dive into some of those objects and some of the places they came from, as we have a conversation with Eric Vitale of the New England Society for Paranormal Research.
For tickets to The Warrens Seekers of The Supernatural Para-con Oct 29 at Mohican Sun Hotel in Connecticut visit Nesper.com

PART 2 - AVAILABLE TO GRAVE KEEPERS ONLY - LISTEN HERE In part two of our interview, available only to Grave Keepers, we discuss:

Are there more undiagnosed cases of possession in today’s world than there was in the past?
Are spirits often present for their own funeral? 
What happened to Eric and his life at a haunted B & B with a cemetery in the back yard?
